item.title: Netanyahu, Wanted by a Landmark Warrant, Now Faces a Smaller World

item.title: Gaetz’s Withdrawal Means the Senate Passed Its First Test
item.description: Trump failed to push Republicans past their red line.

item.title: After meeting with Hegseth, Republican senators rally behind Trump’s defense secretary pick.

item.title: Putin, in Threat to West, Says Russia Struck Ukraine With New Missile
item.description: Mr. Putin said the launch was in response to Ukraine’s recent use of American and British missiles to strike deeper into Russia.
